meanings.definition: Evoking a keen sense of sadness or regret.
meanings.sent1: The movie's poignant ending left everyone in tears.
meanings.sent2: She felt a poignant sadness when she saw the old photo.
meanings.sent3: The poignant story of the lost puppy touched everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent4: The poignant melody of the song brought back memories of happier times.
meanings.sent5: The poignant painting captured the essence of loneliness perfectly.
